member.name: M:Prometheus.AspNetMetricServer.RegisterRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration,Prometheus.AspNetMetricServer.Settings)
member.summary: Registers an anonymous instance of the controller to be published on the /metrics URL.

member.name: M:Prometheus.AspNetMetricServer.RegisterRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration,System.String,Prometheus.AspNetMetricServer.Settings)
member.summary: Registers an anonymous instance of the controller to be published on a given URL path (e.g. "custom/metrics").
